detail_desc: Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames, plastic details and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Supplied in a drawstring fabric bag.
Long-sleeved top in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck, wrapover front and knitted tie belt at the waist. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Shorts in washed cotton denim with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a back pocket.
Top in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
A-line dress in plumeti cotton with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, concealed pockets in the side seams and short cap sleeves with double, flared flounces. Unlined.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Vest top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front.
Pyjama shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and lacing at the front. Smocked seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops. Soft terry inside the feet.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight, cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Mittens in a soft knit containing glittery threads with a sewn-on bow on the uppers, and ribbed cuffs.
Straight blouse in a soft woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a fine knit with a V-neck and long sleeves.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and gently rounded hem.
5-pocket trousers in a brushed cotton weave in a regular fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Bralette in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Unlined.
Short T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a tie at the hem.
Non-wired bra top with a lined front, wide shoulder straps with a decorative knot detail and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Airy chiffon blouse. Long balloon sleeves with gathers at the top, embroidery and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening. Soft linings and insoles and soft, imitation leather soles.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.
Swimming goggles in tinted plastic with frames and decorative appliqués in silicone, and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.
One-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop at the back and textured soles.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in viscose crêpe jersey with a collar, buttons down the front, short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with embroidery. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam and decorative drawstring at the waist, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a flounced hem. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar with a small frill trim, an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck and a V-shaped yoke front and back. Long, wide puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam above the hem for added volume. Unlined.

Cargo trousers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Twill cap with appliqués around the crown, a peak with a jersey top, and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in an airy cotton with a raw-edge collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with raw-edge frills and buttoned cuffs with raw edges. Rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a chest pocket.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Soft smartphone case in transparent plastic with a detachable strap. Can be worn around the neck or over one shoulder. Length of strap approx. 120 cm.
Lined bandeau bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Lacing at the back.
5-pocket denim jeans with a high waist, zip fly and straight, wide legs.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

Trousers in soft Tencel™ modal twill with a regular waist, detachable tie belt and belt loops with a decorative button. Zip fly and button, patch front pockets, back pockets, and gently tapered legs with one flap pocket and two fake jetted pockets.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre and lace with a lined gusset, laser-cut edges at the front and a high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved tunic in a cotton weave with plastic beads at the top and a low stand-up collar with a frill and concealed buttons at the front. Tie belt under the bust and a rounded hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Long wrap dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, ties at the side and short sleeves. Partly lined.

Sleeveless, calf-length, fitted jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck at the front and deep V-neck at the back. Wide shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that provide good support. Lined at the top. The polyester content of the jumpsuit is recycle.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets, pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Hat in a soft rib knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a narrow decorative trim at the top. Mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Short, ribbed sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and elasticated hem. The sports top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and decorative straps at the front. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back where they can be fastened in different ways.
Fully lined bikini bottoms a frill trim at the front, low waist and narrow ties at the sides.

Blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with shimmering metallic threads and sequined details. Narrow cut at the top with a V-shaped opening at the back and a tab and button at the back of the neck. Long, wide, semi-transparent sleeves that drape over the shoulders and have narrow, buttoned cuffs. Lined bodice.

Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and a buttonhole. Side pockets, two inner pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
